text.english: Active 3[AC], 1 Mana: Move Mirana up to 5 slots away. Give Mirana and new neighbors +2[ATT]. [TG]Cross Lane[ET]
Active 3[AC], 1 Mana: Move Mirana up to range 5. Give Mirana and new neighbors +2[ATT]. [TG]Cross Lane[ET]
When Wraith King uses a death shield, heal to full and give enemies -2[ATT] for their next combat. /n [TG]Deploy:[ET] Gain a death shield.
Whenever Wraith King uses a death shield, heal to full and give enemies -2[ATT] for their next combat. /n [TG]Deploy:[ET] Gain a death shield.
When Bristleback takes damage outside of combat, reduce that damage to 1, then activate Quill Spray.
When Bristleback takes non-battle damage, reduce that damage to 1, then activate Quill Spray.

versions.__comment: For whatever reason, the effect text is way more descriptive
versions.__effect_text: When an anything in any lane deals non-reflected non-battle damage to Bristleback, deal 1 reflected damage to Bristleback's enemy neighbors.

text.english: Whenever Bristleback takes non-battle damage, reduce that damage to 1, then activate Quill Spray.
Whenever Bristleback takes non-physical damage, reduce that damage to 1, then activate Quill Spray.
[TG]Active 3[AC], 1 Mana:[ET] Deal 1 combat damage to adjacent enemies.
[TG]Active 3[AC], 1 Mana:[ET] Deal 1 damage to adjacent enemies.
Aura: Treant Protector's allies up to 2 slots away in this lane have +2[AR].
Aura: Treant Protector's allies in this lane within range 2 have +2[AR].
Active [AC]3, 1 Mana: Move Timbersaw up to 5 slots away. Deal 1 damage to each enemy passed on the way. /n [TG]Cross Lane[ET]
Active [AC]3, 1 Mana: Move up to range 5. Deal 1 damage to each enemy passed on the way. /n [TG]Cross Lane[ET]
After Combat: If Debbi the Cunning dealt damage to a tower, give the tower -1[AR] and give Debbi +1[AR] permanently.
Active [AC]3, 1 Mana: Each unit pointing at Keefe the Bold battles itself.
Active [AC]3, 1 Mana: Each unit with Keefe the Bold as their combat target battles itself.
Active [AC]3, 1 Mana: Each unit with Keefe the Bold as their combat target battles itself with +2[ATT].
Active [AC]3, 1 Mana: Each unit with Keefe the Bold as their combat target strikes itself with +2[ATT].
+1[ATT] for each ally in lane.
+1[ATT] for each ally in lane.
Active [AC]4, 1 Mana: Draw a card. Reduce cooldown by 1, but not below 1.
Active [AC]2, 1 Mana: Draw a card.
Deploy to the right instead of the left and Mega Creeps instead of Melee Creeps. /n [TG]Deploy:[ET] Redeploy your leftmost Melee Creep.
Summon Mega Creeps instead of Melee Creeps. Your Melee Creep are summoned on the right. /n [TG]Deploy:[ET] Resummon your leftmost Melee Creep.
[TG]Active 2[AC], 1 Mana:[ET] Battle all adjacent enemies.
The first blue spell or enchantment you cast from this lane can be repeated this round. 2 round cooldown.
When you cast a blue spell or enchantment from this lane it can be repeated this round. 2 round cooldown.
When you cast a spell or enchantment from this lane it can be repeated this round. 2 round cooldown.
Bounty Hunter deals +3 damage when attacking tracked heroes. /n [TG]Deploy:[ET] Track Bounty Hunter's target if it's a hero. Tracked units have +5 Bounty.
Bounty Hunter deals +3 damage when striking tracked heroes. /n [TG]Deploy:[ET] Track Bounty Hunter's target if it's a hero. Tracked units have +5 Bounty.
After Combat: Summon a Lancer Illusion into the closest position.
After Combat: Summon a Lancer Illusion into the closest slot.
After Combat: Summon a Lancer Illusion into the closest slot.
Double damage when attacking a hero.
Double Phantom Assassin's damage when attacking a hero.
Double Phantom Assassin's damage when striking a hero.

[TG]Round Start:[ET] Deal 1 piercing damage to a random enemy and add a charge to your Eclipse cards.
[TG]Active 3, 1 Mana:[ET] Move Anti-Mage up to 5 slots away. Deal 1 battle damage to the unit now blocking Anti-Mage. [TG]Cross Lane[ET].
[TG]Active 3, 1 Mana:[ET] Move up to range 5. Deal 1 battle damage to the unit now blocking Anti-Mage. [TG]Cross Lane[ET].

[TG]Active 3, 1 Mana:[ET] Move up to range 5. Anti-Mage strikes the new unit blocking it for 1 battle damage. [TG]Cross Lane[ET].
[TG]Active 3, 1 Mana:[ET] Move up to range 5. Anti-Mage strikes the new unit blocking it for 1 [ATT]. [TG]Cross Lane[ET].
Burn 1 mana when Anti-Mage deals battle damage to an enemy hero before combat.
Whenever Anti-Mage deals battle damage to an enemy hero before combat, burn 1 mana.
Whenever Anti-Mage deals physical damage to an enemy hero before combat, burn 1 mana.
Sven's attack counts as Cleave in the combat phase. /n Sven still hits the tower if unblocked.
Sven's [ATT] counts as Cleave in the combat phase. /n Sven still hits the tower if unblocked.

Aura: Drow Ranger's allies in all lanes have +1[ATT]. /n [TG]Cross Lane[ET]

Aura: Lycan's allies within range 2 in this lane have +2[ATT].

Aura: If Phantom Lancer is blocked, Phantom Lancer and allied Lancer Illusions have +1[ATT] and +1[AR].

[TG]Active 2[AC], 1 Mana:[ET] Repeat 4 times: [RP] Give an ally +1 temporary [HP] and deal 1 damage to its closest adjacent enemy. Jump left or right to the ally with the least [HP].

The first time you play a non-item card from Tidehunter's lane, deal 1 damage to its adjacent enemies and give them -1[ATT] this round. If there are none, battle the enemy tower instead. 1 round cooldown.
When you play a non-item card, Tidehunter attacks its adjacent enemies for 1 battle damage and gives them -1[ATT]. If there are none, attack the enemy tower for 1 battle damage. 1 round cooldown.
When you play a non-item card, Tidehunter strikes its adjacent enemies for 1 battle damage and gives them -1[ATT]. If there are none, strike the enemy tower for 1 battle damage. 1 round cooldown.

When Venomancer and allied Plague Wards deal physical damage to a unit or tower, give it +1 Decay until its next combat phase.
Lycan has charges equal to the combined Attack of creeps in this lane. If Lycan has 15 or more charges, Lycan has +3[ATT] and allied creeps within range 2 have +1[ATT].
If the combined Attack of your creeps in this lane is 15 or more, Lycan has +3[ATT] and your creeps within range 2 have an extra +1[ATT].
If the combined [ATT] of your creeps in this lane is 15 or more, Lycan has +3[ATT] and your creeps within range 2 have an extra +1[ATT].

After you play a spell or enchantment from Storm Spirit's lane, give Storm Spirit +1[ATT] this round.

When Troll Warlord attacks a new target, set charges to 1. Whenever Troll Warlord attacks that target again, add a charge. /n Troll Warlord deals +1 damage per charge when attacking that target. /n Death Effect: Remove all charges.

When Troll Warlord strikes a new target, set charges to 1. Whenever Troll Warlord strikes that target again, add a charge. /n Troll Warlord deals +1 damage per charge when striking that target. /n Death Effect: Remove all charges.
